en: Thanks for the letter the other day!
I'm great, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing awesome! I've been standing here for a while, thinking about life.[wait=0.3].[wait=0.3]. [wait=1.0]And, you know what?
I'm glad to hear that. I am also completely fine! *smiles*
B-hira stares at you, looking weirded out.
Well, I've got to get going now. See you!
*blushes adowably*[wait=1.5] *starts to look pissed*[wait=1.5] [b]Are you going or not?[/b]
Okay then. Have it your way.
B-hira seems to now be ignoring you completely.
Good morning to you too, A-hira!
Alright, have a good day then!
What is wrong with you today? You're acting weird, like B-hira over there.
Actually, I should go and check up on her soon. She didn't seem to be feeling very good earlier.
